000, Amount = $5m and period of services = 12 months. You should specify planned working hours (POC) in each period (months) and calculate the forecast revenue. At the end of the month you can check PMC system and understand actual reported hours OR you may directly evaluate POC, based on actual delivery state of affairs on the project.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Read more about \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCRMFAQ/Forecasting+and+actual+revenue\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"forecasting and actual revenue.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The forecast should be updated every four weeks. Corrections reports with outdated opportunities are sent to the account managers and escalated to the top management each month.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(70, 69, 71)\"}}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CRM Pipeline\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The pipeline contains monthly forecast and actual revenue for all CRM accounts and their related opportunities in a single view.
